resources.string:
"No bookmarks

Use the Edinburgh Bus Tracker app to add bookmarks first

"No bookmarks

Press the 'map' button above to view a map of stops.

From the map touch a stop on the map to display times, and then press menu to add a bookmark."
"Lothian's website no longer supports future departures beyond the current day :("

"Changes:
 * Add new nearby bookmark times view -- more planned for this.
 * Fix arrival time alerts.
 * Allow arrival time alerts to be delayed.
 * Add warn when nearby stop button to map view.
 * Manually entering a stopcode now has an "add bookmark" checkbox.
 * Icon tweaks: types + headlights.
 * Fix display issues with long service names.
 * Fix initial wildly inaccurate initial map location.
 * Map now scrolls to track user location.
 * Trap lots of errors (thanks for sending in the error reports!).
 * Integrate with google backup API.
"
